// api.js
import axios from"axios";const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"https://learning-management-system-using-react.onrender.com/api";// ✅ your deployed backend
const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL,headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}});// ---------- AUTH ----------
export const authAPI={login:data=>api.post("/auth/login",data),register:data=>api.post("/auth/register",data)};// ---------- BATCH ----------
export const batchAPI={getAll:params=>api.get("/batches",{params}),getById:id=>api.get("/batches/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post("/batches",data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/batches/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/batches/".concat(id)),toggleStatus:id=>api.patch("/batches/".concat(id,"/toggle-status"))};// ---------- STUDENT ----------
export const studentAPI={getAll:params=>api.get("/students",{params}),getById:id=>api.get("/students/".concat(id)),getByBatch:batchId=>api.get("/students/batch/".concat(batchId)),create:data=>api.post("/students",data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/students/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/students/".concat(id))};// ---------- MARK ----------
export const markAPI={getAll:params=>api.get("/marks",{params}),getById:id=>api.get("/marks/".concat(id)),getByStudent:studentId=>api.get("/marks/student/".concat(studentId)),getByBatch:batchId=>api.get("/marks/batch/".concat(batchId)),getStatistics:studentId=>api.get("/marks/statistics/".concat(studentId)),create:data=>api.post("/marks",data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/marks/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/marks/".concat(id))};export default api;
